featured.text: For example, John Steinbeck is (27) to have been an excellent listener, yet he was hated by some of the people he wrote about.

definition.zh_def: 對某人或某事感到強烈的厭惡或反感。
definition.en_def: A strong feeling of dislike or aversion towards someone or something.
definition.example: She felt a deep hate for the injustice she witnessed.
